ygData.subject: Re: suggestions to Verant
ygData.msgSnippet: thsi is not a flame adaar but the one thing i see is you have only played characters to lvl 16.  I agree wizards should actually be a total wimp up to lvl 20
ygData.messageBody:
thsi is not a flame adaar but the one thing i see is you have only played
characters to lvl 16. I agree wizards should actually be a total wimp up to
lvl 20 in my opinion. After that the wizard should dominate. I mean no one
can come close to touching him by lvl 40. I mean it should be the toughest
class to play to lvl 20 so to weed out the week and unwilling. but the thing
is it is still even up to from what i've heard at lvl 35. people still dont
really appreciate the wizard because all the classes do the same or more even
though the wizard is supposed to deliver the most damage. What's the point
of playeing the most powerful person in the game if he is even with everyone
else. I mean these people that created the game are supposed to be D&D fans
and MUD fans. What happens to your lvl 1 wiz in D&D, he dies about 1,000,000
it seems like. But when he reaches around lvl 9 hardly anyone can touch him.
This is how i think it should be in EQ. Just my little rant on why people
want more spells and more power. sorry if it's to long.

Parthon lvl 12
